title: Kotak Bank hopes to offset digital curbs with brick and mortar push
description: Kotak Mahindra Bank is shifting focus to physical branch expansion following ban on digital onboarding, unveiling new distribution structure to integrate branches, digital channels and voice services. Strategy aims to mitigate impact of RBI ban on credit card issuance and online customer onboarding. Analysts cautious on loan growth, but optimistic for future revival.
